sentences.en: In French the adjective must agree with the noun in number and gender.
sentences.cn: 法语中形容词必须在数和性上与名词一致。

sentences.en: But you can use it as an adjective to give emphasis to the word that follows it.
sentences.cn: 但是你可以用它作为形容词来强调后面的单词。

sentences.en: Thus for example, every noun ends in "o", every adjective in "a", and basic form of every verb in "i".
sentences.cn: 例如，每个名词以“ o ”结尾，每个形容词以“ a ”结尾，每个动词的基本形式以“ i ”结尾。
